sections.heading: Recognition
sections.text: of notarial acts performed outside this State.

sections.heading: Certificate of person taking acknowledgment.
sections.text:
The person taking an
acknowledgment shall certify that:

sections.heading: Recognition of certificate of acknowledgment.
sections.text:
The form of a certificate of acknowledgment used by a
person whose authority is recognized under Section 2 shall be accepted in this
State if:

sections.heading: Certificate
sections.text: of acknowledgment. The words "acknowledged before me" means

sections.heading: Acknowledgments not affected by this Act.
sections.text: Acknowledgments not affected by this Act.

sections.heading: Time of taking effect.
sections.text:
This Act shall take effect
on January 1, 1970.
